name: Art Lover's Puzzle Game - Collection #1
description:
Difficulty: ★★★★☆ (Difficult)
Number of puzzles: 16
Hardest puzzle: 270 pieces
Content: a selection of fine oil paintings from The MET Museum

Art Lover’s Puzzle Game – Collection #1 features some well-known public domain paintings from the collection of The MET Museum, New York. Once you solve a puzzle, check "Your Gallery" for information about it and a link to the painting’s page on the museum’s official website. You can learn some interesting facts there and, by browsing around, you can find more paintings to love.

Solving some of the included puzzles may prove challenging. The hardest puzzle has 270 pieces; therefore. Expect to spend a couple of hours on that puzzle alone.

Check Art Lover's Puzzle Game for more collections.
